title: USB-C adapter doesn't work anymore after PIXEL 4 and PIXEL 4XL update
content:
After the new software update I'm not able to use anymore my eadphone with the USB-C Adapter. Either on my PIXEL 4 and PIXEL 4XL. I cleaned the socket, restarted the phone.. all the time just show up the message: "Analogue aduio accessory detected the attached devise is not compatible this phone"
In both my phone doesn't work anymore.. And this is a very problem for me
